paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted variants in the BRCA2 gene, including clinical significance, penetrance data, and individual records.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: Mutation in BRCA2 resulted in a lower survival rate as well (55.6% vs 89.9%; p = 0.003).

functional_data.summary: BRCA2 mutations are associated with reduced survival in breast cancer patients.

variants.additional_notes: BRCA2 mutations were found in 37.7% of the cohort.
key_quotes: BRCA2 was demonstrated as an independent predictor of reduced survival using independent Cox proportional hazard models.
Mutation in BRCA2 resulted in a lower survival rate as well (55.6% vs 89.9%; p = 0.003).

extraction_metadata.notes: Only one variant in BRCA2 was reported in the paper.
